item.title: COPC releases contact center training schedule for the second half of 2015
item.description:
COPC, a consulting firm specializing in customer experience enhancement, has announced its training schedule for the latter half of 2015. The firm offers in-person classes focusing on operational areas within customer contact. Kathleen Jezierski, COO of COPC, highlighted the company’s approach: “Customers interact with companies through many touch points such as phone, email, social media, mobile and the web. We take our call center expertise and apply our proven best practices to manage these newer channels to deliver a unified experience...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/copc-releases-contact-center-training-schedule-for-the-second-half-of-2015/

item.title: PRI Lines For Domestic Call Centers
item.description:
Many companies are turning to domestic call centers, whether they are in-house or independent contractors. All call centers rely on telephone service, and PRI lines are the preferred choice. Let’s explore why. PRI, or Primary Rate Interface, belongs to the Integrated Services Digital Network (ISDN) standard. ISDN aimed to transition all telephone lines from analog to digital. The basic offering, BRI (Basic Rate Interface), provides two phone lines or one phone line with either a 64 Kbps or 128 Kbps data service...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/pri-lines-for-domestic-call-centers/
